creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Hey, Financial Peace Membership or EveryDollar Plus* users. This app is for you! If you don’t currently use one of these amazing tools, you won’t be able to log into this app.

Learn how to manage your money with Financial Peace University and the 7 Baby Steps! This proven personal finance plan has helped nearly 6 million people pay off debt, save money, and invest for the future.

Watch from home or on the go! Financial Peace gives you a mobile-optimized version of our nine-lesson course, so you can watch it at your own pace right from your phone.

Are you ready to experience real life-change? Here’s what you’ll learn in Financial Peace University:

Lesson 1: Baby Step 1 & Budgeting
It doesn’t matter how optimistic you are. The truth is, it’s going to rain. That’s why, before you do anything else, you have to build a $1,000 starter emergency fund. We’ll show you how—using the powerful zero-based budget.

Lesson 2: Baby Step 2
Debt is not a tool to build wealth, and payments don’t have to be a way of life. It’s time to dump all your debt for good with gazelle intensity.

Lesson 3: Baby Step 3
Even after all your non mortgage debt is paid off, don’t slow down. It’s time to increase your emergency fund using all the money you were throwing at your debt!

Lesson 4: Baby Steps 4, 5, 6 & 7
Baby Steps 4–6 are done in order, but at the same time. You’ll put 15% of your income into a retirement account, save for your kid’s college fund, and make extra payments on your mortgage. Then, Baby Step 7 is when you’ll have the most fun—building wealth and giving like no one else!

Lesson 5: Buyer Beware
There are a million marketing tactics out there trying to get your money and bust your budget. But you can have power over your purchases! We’ll show you what to look out for.

Lesson 6: Understanding Insurance
You can get insurance for anything under the sun. But there’s only seven types you actually need.

Lesson 7: Building Wealth
You’re on your way to becoming an everyday millionaire! In this lesson, we dive deep into investing so you can retire with dignity and live like no one else.

Lesson 8: Real Estate & Mortgages
A house is the largest financial investment you will ever make, so you’ve got to get this right! We’ll cover buying and selling and everything in between.

Lesson 9: Outrageous Generosity
God is a giver, and because we’re made in His image, we were designed to be givers too! If we all became outrageously generous, we could completely change the landscape of America.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://www.financialpeace.com/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: The Proven Money Plan

title: FinancialPeace

creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
Exclusively for Ramsey+ members, FinancialPeace is everything you need to learn about money in one place. That’s right—this is the only playbook you need to pay off debt, save money, and invest for the future.

In the first 90 days of working our plan, the average family pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. And you’ll find the step-by-step plan right in this app . . . plus a whole lot more.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Dave Ramsey Show, the FinancialPeace app will give you access to an expanding library of online courses you can take on the go—including Financial Peace University and Budgeting That Actually Works.

Download this app to get:

• Unlimited streaming of exclusive video lessons on saving, paying off debt, investing, insurance and more (we’re regularly adding new content!)
• Practical, proven steps that have helped more than 6 million people win with money
• The content you need to make the most of EveryDollar and the BabySteps app
• Access to everything you need from a desktop, Apple TV, phone or tablet

What are you still doing here? Download FinancialPeace and start making moves toward a stress-free future.

*To access this app, you need to be a member of Ramsey+. Start a free trial at ramseyplus.com.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://www.financialpeace.com/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: The Proven Money Plan

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
# 2020.09.28
- All Action Steps that appear in Financial Peace University on RamseyPlus.com have been added.
- Your Action Steps progress will sync between this app and RamseyPlus.com.

title: FinancialPeace: A Simple Financial Plan That Works

creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
FinancialPeace is everything you wish you’d learned about money—all in one place. These teachings have helped MILLIONS worry less about money. You’re next.

How do you save more money? Pay off debt? What about investing the right way? And how the heck do you make a budget and ACTUALLY stick to it? You’ll learn it all—with FinancialPeace.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Dave Ramsey Show, FinancialPeace gives you access to a library of online money courses you can watch on the go—including Financial Peace University, the class that’s helped people take control of their money for over 25 years. All those burning questions you have about money? You’ll get answers. And you’ll also learn our step-by-step money plan—so you never have to worry if you’re doing the right thing with your money.

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking real, practical know-how you can put into practice TODAY to start making progress with money faster than you ever have.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach about money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles of handling money that will keep you from making those mistakes ever again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
We break down money into simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your family. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work. In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700.

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+. Wait, why not just FinancialPeace? Well, here’s the thing—if you want to get better with money, learning is only half the battle. It takes changing your mindset AND your habits. That’s where Ramsey+ can help. All three of our apps work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small, consistent wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that actually last.

With Ramsey+, you also get access to:
• EveryDollar – Take control of where your money is going by planning your spending and saving in our easy-to-use budgeting app.
• BabySteps – Track your progress through our steps and watch in real time how all those smarter choices with money pay off.
Not a member of Ramsey+ yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:
• Get unlimited streaming of exclusive video courses
• Financial Peace University – Learn the step-by-step plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
• Jump Start – Start getting small wins with your money and start making progress right away.
• Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on how to make a budget that makes sense—no matter what stage of life you’re in.
• Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Uncover why you handle money the way you do—and the fears and tendencies holding you back.
• The Legacy Journey – Discover a new way to think about wealth building and generosity.
• And even more content coming soon!
• Learn practical, simple steps that have helped millions of people worry less about money
• Stream lessons on desktop, phone, or tablet
• Check out action steps and extra resources that help you make faster progress

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://www.financialpeace.com/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Learn the steps to save money, pay off debt, and grow wealth faster than ever.

FinancialPeace is everything you wish you’d learned about money—all in one place. These teachings have helped MILLIONS worry less about money. You’re next.

How do you save more money? Pay off debt? What about investing the right way? And how the heck do you make a budget and ACTUALLY stick to it? You’ll learn it all—with FinancialPeace.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Dave Ramsey Show, FinancialPeace gives you access to a library of online money courses you can watch on the go—including Financial Peace University, the class that’s helped people take control of their money for over 25 years. All those burning questions you have about money? You’ll get answers. And you’ll also learn our step-by-step money plan—so you never have to worry if you’re doing the right thing with your money.

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking real, practical know-how you can put into practice TODAY to start making progress with money faster than you ever have.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach about money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles of handling money that will keep you from making those mistakes ever again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
We break down money into simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your family. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work. In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700.

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+. Wait, why not just FinancialPeace? Well, here’s the thing—if you want to get better with money, learning is only half the battle. It takes changing your mindset AND your habits. That’s where Ramsey+ can help. All three of our apps work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small, consistent wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that actually last.

With Ramsey+, you also get access to:
• EveryDollar – Take control of where your money is going by planning your spending and saving in our easy-to-use budgeting app.
• BabySteps – Track your progress through our steps and watch in real time how all those smarter choices with money pay off.
Not a member of Ramsey+ yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:
• Get unlimited streaming of exclusive video courses
• Financial Peace University – Learn the step-by-step plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
• Jump Start – Start getting small wins with your money and start making progress right away.
• Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on how to make a budget that makes sense—no matter what stage of life you’re in.
• Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Uncover why you handle money the way you do—and the fears and tendencies holding you back.
• The Legacy Journey – Discover a new way to think about wealth building and generosity.
• And even more content coming soon!
• Learn practical, simple steps that have helped millions of people worry less about money
• Stream lessons on desktop, phone, or tablet
• Check out action steps and extra resources that help you make faster progress

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://www.financialpeace.com/terms-of-service and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Learn the steps to save money, pay off debt, and grow wealth faster than ever.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Pay no attention to the code behind the curtain. This update helps things run smoothly—so you can keep learning like a champ.

title: FinancialPeace: A Simple Financial Plan That Works

creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
FinancialPeace is everything you wish you’d learned about money—all in one place. Get the plan that’s helped MILLIONS worry less about money. (Next up? You.)

How do you save more money? Pay off debt? What about investing? And how the heck do you make a budget and ACTUALLY stick to it? You’ll learn it all—with FinancialPeace.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Ramsey Show, FinancialPeace sets you up with a library of online money courses you can watch on the go—including Financial Peace University, the class that’s helped millions take control of their money for over 25 years.

All those burning questions you have about money? You’ll get answers. And you’ll follow our step-by-step financial plan—the 7 Baby Steps.

We know money can feel super overwhelming. That’s exactly why we broke it down into simple steps anyone can follow to know they’re doing the right thing with money. Seriously—anyone. (That includes you, btw.)

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking practical know-how (in plain English) you can put into practice TODAY to save more money and become debt-free—faster.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+.

With Ramsey+, you’ll learn our financial plan—and then put that plan into action. You get apps that work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that last.

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

Don’t have a Ramsey+ membership yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:

Get Unlimited Streaming of Exclusive Video Courses

* Financial Peace University – Learn the financial plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
* Jump Start – Start making progress with money right away.
* Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on making a budget you’ll actually stick to.
* Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Discover the fears and tendencies with money that have been holding you back.
* And even more!
* Watch on desktop, phone, tablet, or Airplay with AppleTV.

Track Your Baby Steps Progress

* Find out which Baby Step you’re on.
* Discover the date you’ll be debt-free using the debt snowball method.
* See your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
* Track on desktop and mobile.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/terms-of-use and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Simple finance education on how to save, invest and pay off debt.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In case you missed it, we’ve added some cool new features to the FinancialPeace app!
You can now:

• Find out what Baby Step you’re on.
• Discover your debt-free date.
• Update your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
• Throw a virtual snowball at your debt. (Take that student loans!)

Oh, and we’ve fixed a problem that kept some images from loading for some people.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Things just got personal. Introducing brand-new questions to help us know more about you, your money and your goals—so you can know exactly where you are and how to get where you want to be. It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+.

With Ramsey+, you’ll learn our financial plan—and then put that plan into action. You get apps that work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that last.

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

Don’t have a Ramsey+ membership yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:

Get Unlimited Streaming of Exclusive Video Courses

* Financial Peace University – Learn the financial plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
* Jump Start – Start making progress with money right away.
* Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on making a budget you’ll actually stick to.
* Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Discover the fears and tendencies with money that have been holding you back.
* And even more!
* Watch on desktop, phone, tablet, or Airplay with AppleTV.

Track Your Baby Steps Progress

* Find out which Baby Step you’re on.
* Discover the date you’ll be debt-free using the debt snowball method.
* See your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
* Track on desktop and mobile.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/terms-of-use and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The name of the game with this update is customization. It’s all about getting more accurate info—so we can make the best recommendations for you and your money.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

title: FinancialPeace: Money Plan and Goal Tracker

creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
FinancialPeace is everything you wish you’d learned about money—all in one place. Get the plan that’s helped MILLIONS worry less about money. (Next up? You.)

How do you save more money? Pay off debt? What about investing? And how the heck do you make a budget and ACTUALLY stick to it? You’ll learn it all—with FinancialPeace.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Ramsey Show, FinancialPeace sets you up with a library of online money courses you can watch on the go—including Financial Peace University, the class that’s helped millions take control of their money for over 25 years.

All those burning questions you have about money? You’ll get answers. And you’ll follow our step-by-step financial plan—the 7 Baby Steps.

We know money can feel super overwhelming. That’s exactly why we broke it down into simple steps anyone can follow to know they’re doing the right thing with money. Seriously—anyone. (That includes you, btw.)

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking practical know-how (in plain English) you can put into practice TODAY to save more money and become debt-free—faster.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+.

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

Don’t have a Ramsey+ membership yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

* Watch on desktop, phone, tablet, or Airplay with AppleTV.

* Find out which Baby Step you’re on.
* Discover the date you’ll be debt-free using the debt snowball method.
* See your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
* Track on desktop and mobile.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Great news: Everyone gets their own custom money plan! “What’s a custom money plan?” you ask. It’s a breakdown of where your money is actually going and exactly what it’ll take to pay off your debt. Plus, you get to put your plan into action with a budget. (P.S. We’re still working out all the kinks for this section, so give us some grace. But it’s pretty awesome!)

title: FinancialPeace: Money Plan and Goal Tracker

creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
FinancialPeace is everything you wish you’d learned about money—all in one place. Get the plan that’s helped MILLIONS worry less about money. (Next up? You.)

How do you save more money? Pay off debt? What about investing? And how the heck do you make a budget and ACTUALLY stick to it? You’ll learn it all—with FinancialPeace.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Ramsey Show, FinancialPeace sets you up with a library of online money courses you can watch on the go—including Financial Peace University, the class that’s helped millions take control of their money for over 25 years.

All those burning questions you have about money? You’ll get answers. And you’ll follow our step-by-step financial plan—the 7 Baby Steps.

We know money can feel super overwhelming. That’s exactly why we broke it down into simple steps anyone can follow to know they’re doing the right thing with money. Seriously—anyone. (That includes you, btw.)

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking practical know-how (in plain English) you can put into practice TODAY to save more money and become debt-free—faster.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+.

With Ramsey+, you’ll learn our financial plan—and then put that plan into action. You get apps that work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that last.

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

Don’t have a Ramsey+ membership yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:

Get Unlimited Streaming of Exclusive Video Courses

* Financial Peace University – Learn the financial plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
* Jump Start – Start making progress with money right away.
* Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on making a budget you’ll actually stick to.
* Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Discover the fears and tendencies with money that have been holding you back.
* And even more!
* Watch on desktop, phone, tablet, or Airplay with AppleTV.

Track Your Baby Steps Progress

* Find out which Baby Step you’re on.
* Discover the date you’ll be debt-free using the debt snowball method.
* See your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
* Track on desktop and mobile.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/terms-of-use and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
One dashboard to rule them all! Now you can quickly see a snapshot of your debt-free progress all in one place, including:
* If you need to create your debt snowball
* Your debt-free date
* How much you’ve paid toward each debt
* Your current pace (and if you need to pick up the speed)
* Ways to pay off your debt faster

We’ve also updated the recommendations with more info about WHY you need to do them along with some general bug fixes.

We know money can feel super overwhelming. That’s exactly why we broke it down into simple steps anyone can follow to know they’re doing the right thing with money. Seriously—anyone. (That includes you, btw.)

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking practical know-how (in plain English) you can put into practice TODAY to save more money and become debt-free—faster.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+.

With Ramsey+, you’ll learn our financial plan—and then put that plan into action. You get apps that work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that last.

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

Don’t have a Ramsey+ membership yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:

Get Unlimited Streaming of Exclusive Video Courses

* Financial Peace University – Learn the financial plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
* Jump Start – Start making progress with money right away.
* Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on making a budget you’ll actually stick to.
* Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Discover the fears and tendencies with money that have been holding you back.
* And even more!
* Watch on desktop, phone, tablet, or Airplay with AppleTV.

Track Your Baby Steps Progress

* Find out which Baby Step you’re on.
* Discover the date you’ll be debt-free using the debt snowball method.
* See your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
* Track on desktop and mobile.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/terms-of-use and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Simple finance education on how to save, invest and pay off debt.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
One dashboard to rule them all! Now you can quickly see a snapshot of your debt-free progress all in one place, including:
* If you need to create your debt snowball
* Your debt-free date
* How much you’ve paid toward each debt
* Your current pace (and if you need to pick up the speed)
* Ways to pay off your debt faster

We’ve also updated the recommendations with more info about WHY you need to do them along with some general bug fixes.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
“I want my experience throughout the app to be consistent, informative and just plain beautiful.”
We hear you, FinancialPeace user!
And that’s why we’ve personalized some questions, added clarity around recommendations, fixed some bugs, and made it easier to navigate (because good navigation is beautiful!). Little changes add up to a better app experience—just like small steps add up to big results on your money journey!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Let’s get you on pace to be debt-free! appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Hey, everyone needs a reminder every now and again, right? We want to encourage you to keep doing #allthethings. So the next time you log in, we’ll ask if you want to occasionally get a digital high-five from us (in the form of push notifications). That way you can stay on track and put your progress into overdrive. Cool? Cool. We also did some fancy code stuff in the background that would bore you if we explained it, but it helps the app run smoother.

Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking practical know-how (in plain English) you can put into practice TODAY to save more money and become debt-free—faster.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP
So, first things first. To access this app, you’ll need to be a member of Ramsey+.

With Ramsey+, you’ll learn our financial plan—and then put that plan into action. You get apps that work together to help you make smarter choices with money. Every. Single. Day. And when those small wins add up, you’ll see BIG results in your bank account—and better money habits that last.

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

Don’t have a Ramsey+ membership yet? No problem. Start your FREE TRIAL at ramseyplus.com.

KEY APP FEATURES:

Get Unlimited Streaming of Exclusive Video Courses

* Financial Peace University – Learn the financial plan to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and become outrageously generous.
* Jump Start – Start making progress with money right away.
* Budgeting That Actually Works – Get clear-cut guidance on making a budget you’ll actually stick to.
* Know Yourself, Know Your Money – Discover the fears and tendencies with money that have been holding you back.
* And even more!
* Watch on desktop, phone, tablet, or Airplay with AppleTV.

Track Your Baby Steps Progress

* Find out which Baby Step you’re on.
* Discover the date you’ll be debt-free using the debt snowball method.
* See your savings, debt payoff and investing progress.
* Track on desktop and mobile.

Note that this app is only available for use in the United States. Please read the Terms of Service: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/terms-of-use and Privacy Policy: https://policies.ramseysolutions.net/privacy-policy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Hey, everyone needs a reminder every now and again, right? We want to encourage you to keep doing #allthethings. So the next time you log in, we’ll ask if you want to occasionally get a digital high-five from us (in the form of push notifications). That way you can stay on track and put your progress into overdrive. Cool? Cool. We also did some fancy code stuff in the background that would bore you if we explained it, but it helps the app run smoother.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Things we love: deep sleep, deep pockets, deep-sea fishing . . . and deep links. Now when you get a link from us to somewhere specific in the app, you’ll go straight to where you want to be—and not on some rabbit trail. Yay for making it easier to update your money progress!

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS

TRY RAMSEY+ TO GET THE APP

Ramsey+ also gives you access to EveryDollar, our easy-to-use budgeting app where you can plan out your spending and saving—so you always know where your money is going.

title: FinancialPeace: Money Plan and Goal Tracker

creator: Ramsey Solutions
descriptionHtml:
FinancialPeace is everything you wish you’d learned about money—all in one place. Get the plan that’s helped MILLIONS worry less about money. (Next up? You.)

How do you save more money? Pay off debt? What about investing? And how the heck do you make a budget and ACTUALLY stick to it? You’ll learn it all—with FinancialPeace.

From Ramsey Solutions, home of The Ramsey Show, FinancialPeace sets you up with a library of online money courses you can watch on the go—including Financial Peace University, the class that’s helped millions take control of their money for over 25 years.

All those burning questions you have about money? You’ll get answers. And you’ll follow our step-by-step financial plan—the 7 Baby Steps.

We know money can feel super overwhelming. That’s exactly why we broke it down into simple steps anyone can follow to know they’re doing the right thing with money. Seriously—anyone. (That includes you, btw.)

MONEY LESSONS YOU CAN ACTUALLY UNDERSTAND
Stuffy financial courses? Yeah, we’re not about that. We’re not talking theory. We’re talking practical know-how (in plain English) you can put into practice TODAY to save more money and become debt-free—faster.

MONEY EXPERTS YOU CAN ACTUALLY TRUST
Forget your finance professor. Our financial experts teach money like actual humans. (Not a textbook.) Hey, we’ve all made mistakes with money. They have too. And they’ll lay out the principles that will keep you from making those mistakes. Ever. Again.

A MONEY PLAN THAT ACTUALLY WORKS
It’s not magic. It’s not luck. It’s just the simple steps that have worked for millions of people from every walk of life. The Baby Steps are the same for everyone. But the small wins along the way? They’re catered to you. Your life. Your goals. That’s what makes this plan work.

And how will you know the plan is working? Tracking. Your. Progress. With interactive tracking features, you’ll save money (and watch your confidence grow along with your bank account). And as you pay off debt, your stress level goes with it. (Good riddance.)

In fact, in the first 90 days of working our plan, the average household pays off $5,300 in debt and saves $2,700. (Average never sounded so good.)
